thread.title: Perfect location in Paris - Review
thread.title_full: Perfect location in Paris - Review of Hotel 7 Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: birthday58
title: Perfect location in Paris - Review
text: This hotel was perfect for spending a week seeing the sites of Paris. Located just a short walk from the Eiffel Tower, it is located in a great neighborhood with shopping, excellent restaurants, cafes, and bakeries. The amenities in the hotel are wonderful with a very attentive and professional staff. Everyone on staff tried to make our stay comfortable and always willing to help with any questions. The outside terrace on the fifth floor is a must for relaxing before or after a day of walking the city.
